caption: nhl.com
description: The Oilers were dealt a 5-2 decision by the Capitals on Saturday.
message: The #Oilers got early goals from Patrick Maroon & Adam Larsson but the Washington Capitals scored five straight to emerge with a 5-2 win.

caption: nhl.com
description: The Oilers homestand continues tonight against the Washington Capitals.
message: GAME DAY! The #Oilers look to make it back-to-back wins as the Washington Capitals visit Rogers Place at 8pm MT on Hockey Night In Canada. The lineup is expected to be the same as Thursday's victory.

description: The Oilers defeated the Dallas Stars 5-4 on Thursday at Rogers Place.
message: Benning buried the game-winner & RNH led the way with a pair as the #Oilers emerged victorious 5-4 over the Dallas Stars to start their homestand.

caption: nhl.com
description: The Oilers return to Rogers Place tonight to host the Dallas Stars.
message: GAME DAY! Following a 1-1-1 road trip, the #Oilers are back on home ice to host the Dallas Stars at 7pm MT on Sportsnet (SN-WEST). Talbot starts, Draisaitl is with McDavid & Maroon, Letestu is with Lucic & RNH.
name: Edmonton Oilers

message: #Oilers interviews ahead of tonight vs. Dallas Stars.
name: Edmonton Oilers

caption: nhl.com
description: Celebrate 100 years of the National Hockey League Nov. 3-5 at Rogers Place!
message: Just over a week until the NHL's Centennial Fan Arena arrives in ICE District just outside Rogers Place! Come on down Nov. 3-5 to see the Stanley Cup or even try the virtual reality Zamboni experience!
name: Edmonton Oilers

message: The #Oilers & Captain Connor McDavid are proud to partner with Canadian Tire to welcome Canadian Tire Jumpstart kids to #ConnorsCorner at select home games all season long!
name: Edmonton Oilers

caption: nhl.com
description: The Oilers annual Hockey Fights Cancer game will be Nov. 3 vs. New Jersey.
message: Rogers Place is going lavender on Friday, Nov. 3 for our annual #HockeyFightsCancer game! #Oilers mittens will be available for purchase for $20 in support of Kids with Cancer Society & our community foundation. Limited tickets to this game are available via Ticketmaster.
name: Edmonton Oilers

caption: nhl.com
description: The Oilers earned a single point with a 2-1 OT loss to the Penguins.
message: Talbot turned aside 42 & McDavid scored but Murray stole the show as the #Oilers dropped a 2-1 OT decision to the Pittsburgh Penguins.

message: McDavid's magnificent equalizer.

description: The Oilers conclude their three-game road trip against the Penguins.

name: Edmonton Oilers

description: The Oilers were defeated 2-1 by the Philadelphia Flyers on Saturday.

description: The Oilers open up a three-game road trip against the Chicago Blackhawks.
